description: Create/Update tag description in scope of the Api.

if_match.description: ETag of the Entity. Not required when creating an entity, but required when updating an entity.

api_version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

properties.description: Properties supplied to Create TagDescription operation.

api_id.description: API revision identifier. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance. Non-current revision has ;rev=n as a suffix where n is the revision number.

tag_id.description: Tag identifier. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

service_name.description: The name of the API Management service.
